data.text:
i love tge service love the breakfast and the saved by Imran.
the room where fine. the rooms where clean.  loved the cocktails. the room service was on point, love the beds very comfortable and soft sheets. 
the welcome on the fist day was amazing and got an upgrade.  had 4 kids and felt at home. the pool is great
data.title: wow services

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Gillian M,

Thank you for choosing Media Rotana Dubai and for taking the time to share your fantastic experience with us!

We're thrilled to hear that you loved the service provided by our team, especially Imran, who went above and beyond to ensure your stay was enjoyable. Providing exceptional service is what we strive for, and it's wonderful to know that we succeeded in making your experience memorable.

We're also pleased that you enjoyed our breakfast offerings, found the rooms to be clean and comfortable, and loved the cocktails. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we're delighted that we met your expectations in these aspects.

It's fantastic to hear that our room service was on point and that you felt at home with your family during your stay. We're glad that the welcome you received on the first day was amazing and that you appreciated the upgrade.

Thank you once again for your kind words and for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Media Rotana Dubai for another unforgettable experience!

Kind regards,

Sherif Madkour
General Manager
owner_response.author: Media Rotana

data.text: Firs time came here with my family to Iftar buffet.Iftar buffet was higher than my expectations. A lot of food, everything so delicious and fresh. Personal very friendly. Definitely will come again and recommend this place to my friends..
data.title: Very nice

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for choosing to celebrate Iftar with us at Media Rotana Dubai, and for taking the time to share your experience.

We're delighted to hear that your first visit to our Iftar buffet exceeded your expectations! It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed the wide variety of delicious and fresh food offerings. Ensuring our guests have a memorable dining experience is important to us, and we're thrilled that we succeeded in doing so during your visit.

We're also pleased to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and accommodating. Providing excellent service is a priority for us, and we're glad to know that our team members contributed to making your experience enjoyable.

Thank you for your kind words and for recommending us to your friends. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another delightful dining experience in the future!

Kind regards,

Sherif Madkour
General Manager
owner_response.author: Media Rotana

data.text: We are regular quests at f&B  and it‚Äôs Very very high recommended , people are so nice and very helpful, good ambiance and near to all tourist attractions , I recommend it again especially for family .. thanks for the people who were very helpful‚Ä¶
data.title: Best hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Samer A,

Thank you for your wonderful review and for choosing Media Rotana Dubai as your preferred destination. We're thrilled to hear that you consider us the best hotel and that you're regular guests at our F&B outlets.

It's fantastic to know that you find our staff exceptionally nice and helpful. Providing warm hospitality and excellent service is what we strive for, and it's always rewarding to hear when our guests feel well taken care of.

We're glad you enjoy the ambiance of our hotel and find our location convenient for exploring Dubai's tourist attractions. We truly appreciate your recommendation, especially for families, and we're grateful for your kind words.

Thank you once again for your loyalty and for taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back to Media Rotana Dubai for many more memorable stays.

Kind regards,

Sherif Madkour
General Manager
owner_response.author: Media Rotana

data.text: The buffet was phenomenal especially the main cousrses and appetisers they all fresh however the desert was on the dry side and could use a bit more of a variety. The staff and service was also topnotch. Overall highly recommended to anyone thinking of coming.
data.title: Iftar buffet at channel was really good

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ehab A,

Thank you for sharing your experience of our Iftar at Channels in Media Rotana Dubai. We are delighted to hear that you found the buffet to be phenomenal, especially with regard to the freshness of the main courses and appetizers. Your feedback regarding the desserts is duly noted, and we will certainly work on improving the variety and ensuring they are more moist and delectable.

We're thrilled that you found the staff and service to be top-notch. Providing exceptional service is a priority for us, and we're pleased to hear that our team members contributed to making your dining experience enjoyable.

Thank you for recommending Channels to others. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable dining experience.

Kind regards,

Sherif Madkour
General Manager
owner_response.author: Media Rotana

data.text: I came to pick up a guest from the hotel, my car was hit by another car in the hotel parking B1. After about 12 hours of investigating, they told me they could not find any unusual activity. Who cares about unusual activity?? I wanted them to find out the person who hit my car and ran away. They finally told me that my car was hit outside ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
data.title: Poor Security System

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and frustration you experienced regarding the incident with your car in our parking area.

We understand your concern and regret any miscommunication that may have occurred during the investigation process. Our primary goal is to ensure the safety and well-being of all our guests, as well as their property, and we take incidents like these very seriously.

We will review our procedures and communication protocols to ensure that similar situations are handled more effectively in the future. If there's anything further we can do to assist you or if you have any additional concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us directly.

Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust in the future.

Kind regards,

Sherif Madkour
General Manager
owner_response.author: Media Rotana
